column4: I am trying to convert a video from avi to mp4 using mp4ize script from http://www.ubuntu-unleashed.com/2007/08/howto-convert-videos-to-ipod-smartphone.html , but it gives error "Unknown codec aac", i even tried changing it to libfaac, no use, also did ldconfig couple of times.
you mean i should change it to mencoder?
no use mencoder package... comes with mplayer
